To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private T3MovingAverage _t3;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_t3 = T3(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_t3.IsReady)
{
    var current = _t3.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.t3 = self.T3(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.t3.IsReady:
    current = self.t3.Current.Value
